Deleting your cache directory will cause: A gyorsítótár könyvtár törlése néhány beállítás elvesztéséhez vezet. Ne töröld a gyorsítótár könyvtáradat, hacsak a Streamlabs személyzete nem ad erre utasítást
Confirm stream title and game before goi: A közvetítés címének és a játéknak a megerősítése az élő adás kezdése előtt
Enable reporting additional information: Enable reporting additional information on a crash (requires restart)
WARNING! You will lose all scenes, sourc: FIGYELEM! Az összes jelenetet, forrást és beállítást elveszted. Ezt nem lehet visszavonni!
Your cache directory has been successful: A gyorsítótár könyvtár sikeresen feltöltődött. A %{file} fájlnevet másolták a vágólapra.
Stream Labels session has been successfu: A Stream Labels munkamenet sikeresen újra lett indítva!
This action will restart the application: Ez a művelet újraindítja az alkalmazást. Folytatod?
Automatically record when streaming: Felvétel automatikus indítása stream kezdése esetén
Keep recording when stream stops: Felvétel folytatása a stream leállítása esetén
No elements found. Consider changing the: Elem nem található. Próbáld meg más keresési paraméterekkel.
Do not back up my media files in the clo: Ne mentse a média fájljaimat a felhőbe (újraindítás szükséges)
Single click selects group. Double click: Egyetlen kattintással kiválasztja a csoportot. Kattintson duplán az elemre
Double click selects group. Single click: Kattintson duplán a csoportra. Egyetlen kattintással kiválasztja az elemet
Navigate to Live tab when going live: Nyissa meg az Élő fület, amikor élőben jelenik meg
Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced: Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced functionality. Some features may stop working as expected
Deleting your cache directory will cause: A gyorsítótár könyvtár törlése néhány beállítás elvesztéséhez vezet. Ne töröld a gyorsítótár könyvtáradat, hacsak a Streamlabs személyzete nem ad erre utasítást.
You can not change these settings when y: You can not change these settings when you're live
This feature is intended for overlay des: This feature is intended for overlay designers to export their work for our Overlay Library. Not all sources will be exported, use at your own risk.
Change the look of Streamlabs Desktop wi: Change the look of Streamlabs Desktop with Ultra
Maximum custom destinations has been add: Maximum custom destinations has been added
The Virtual Webcam plugin needs to be up: The Virtual Webcam plugin needs to be updated before it can be started. This requires administrator privileges.
Virtual Webcam requires administrator pr: Virtual Webcam requires administrator privileges to be installed on your system.
If the virtual webcam does not appear in: If the virtual webcam does not appear in other applications, you may need to restart your computer.
Virtual Webcam allows you to display you: Virtual Webcam allows you to display your scenes from Streamlabs Desktop in video conferencing software. Streamlabs Desktop will appear as a Webcam that can be selected in most video conferencing apps.
Uninstalling Virtual Webcam will remove: Uninstalling Virtual Webcam will remove it as a device option in other applications.
The diagnostic report is an automaticall: The diagnostic report is an automatically generated report that contains information about your system and configuration. Clicking the upload button below will generate and securely transmit a diagnostic report to the Streamlabs team.
There was an error uploading the diagnos: There was an error uploading the diagnostic report. Please try again, and let the Streamlabs Streamer Success team know if the issue persists.
The diagnostic report was securely uploa: The diagnostic report was securely uploaded, and the Report ID below has been copied to your clipboard. Please provide the Report ID to the Streamlabs Streamer Success Team.
Show announcements for new Streamlabs fe: Show announcements for new Streamlabs features and products
Disable live streaming features (Recordi: Az élő közvetítési funkciók kikapcsolása (csak felvétel mód)
Automatically start replay buffer when s: Automatically start replay buffer when streaming
Keep replay buffer active when stream st: Keep replay buffer active when stream stops
Dynamically change bitrate when dropping: Dynamically change bitrate when dropping frames while streaming
Low Latency Audio Buffering Mode (For De: Low Latency Audio Buffering Mode (For Decklink/NDI outputs), requires a restart
Always minimize to system tray instead o: Always minimize to system tray instead of task bar
Minimize to system tray when started: Minimize to system tray when started
Snap Sources to horizontal and vertical: Snap Sources to horizontal and vertical center
Reset timestamps at the beginning of eac: Reset timestamps at the beginning of each split file
slidConnectMessage: Állítsd be vagy csatlakoztass egy Streamlabs ID-t, hogy egyetlen bejelentkezéssel hozzáférj a Streamlabs összes termékéhez. (Ez a művelet újbóli bejelentkezést igényelhet)
Enable custom navigation bar to pin your:
Enable custom navigation bar to pin your favorite features for quick access.
Disable to swap to compact view.
The resolution must be in the format [wi: The resolution must be in the format [width]x[height] (i.e. 1920x1080)
This number is too large for a FPS Denom: This number is too large for a FPS Denominator of %{fpsDen}, please decrease it or increase the Denominator
This number is too large for a FPS Numer: This number is too large for a FPS Numerator of %{fpsNum}, please decrease it or increase the Numerator
FPS Value must be between 1 and 1000: FPS Value must be between 1 and 1000
Auto optimizer disabled for dual output: Auto optimizer disabled for dual output scenes
Please connect platforms directly from S: Please connect platforms directly from Streamlabs Desktop instead of adding Streamlabs Multistream as a custom destination
